pos_mean_info_list.mean: 提升，[劳经] 晋升；推销，促销；促进；发扬，振兴

word_mean_info__list.difference: 中性词，既可指对好事的促进、推进，又可指对坏事的助长。
指在某一进程的任何时期或阶段提供积极的帮助与支持。
指能促进事物向前发展的因素，但这种因素并非决定性的。
口语用词，通常指利用自己的活动或影响推进某事。
通常指为加速某一进程或达到某个预期目的而给予有效的促进，强调作出有意识、决定性的努力。

word_group.brief_definition: 促进经济增长；促进生长
增进友谊；使友谊更加深厚
促进福利；促进社会福利；福利机制改进

bilingual.source: Enough sunlight and water can promote rapid growth in plants.
bilingual.target: 充足的阳光和水分能够促进植物的快速生长。
我们需要促进团队合作。
按摩可以促进血液循环。
寡糖可以促进肠道健康。
这项政策将促进经济增长。

bilingual.source: The goal of the union is to promote peace.
bilingual.target: 这个联盟的目标是促进和平。

bilingual.source: The new policy aims to promote social harmony.
bilingual.target: 新政策旨在促进社会和谐。

bilingual.source: Certain foods and drinks can promote diuresis.
bilingual.target: 某些食物和饮料可以促进利尿。

bilingual.source: The company segregates waste to promote recycling.
bilingual.target: 公司使分离废物以促进回收。

yingyinNormal.en: In this era of instability and intolerance, we need to promote better understanding through the power of music.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这个动荡和冲突的时代，我们需要通过音乐的力量，促进更好的理解。

yingyinNormal.en: This weekend, I'll depart for Asia to advance American leadership and promote American jobs in a dynamic region that will be critical to our security and prosperity in the century ahead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个周末，我要前往亚洲促进美国领导力在这一颇具活力地区发挥作用也促进我们美国人的就业，这一地区对我们在未来一个世纪的安全与繁荣至关重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Think of it as us saying, "You're just too valuable to promote."
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样想"太有才了，舍不得让升职"。

yingyinNormal.en: Drac, I told the guys social media is the best way to promote the hotel. Right, Clifton?
yingyinNormal.zh: 德古，我跟大家说了社交媒体是宣传酒店的最好方法，是吗，克利夫顿？

yingyinNormal.en: If we promote you to junior professor, you'll be able to choose whatever field of research you'd like.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们将你升为初级教授，这样你就能想研究什么就研究什么。

yingyinNormal.en: It could also reduce cytokines, which promote inflammation, as well as boost oxytocin, a hormone that's been shown to ease anxiety.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一个好处是降低会导致发炎的胞质分裂，并且会刺激可以降低焦虑的催产素。

yingyinNormal.en: So your solution is to promote me and pay me more money so that I can impart my knowledge to the next generation of scientists? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你的解决方法就是给我升职，给我加薪，然后让我能把我的学识传授给下一代的科学家们吗？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: So today, what's my call to action? I want to help improve and promote the cultural exchange between the East and West I think I have made that clear, but how?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以今天，我要呼吁什么？我想要加强东西方之间的文化交流，这点已经很清楚了，但是如何做到？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 加强; 促进; 提倡

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 促进；增进；发扬；提倡；提拔；晋升；擢升；促销；宣传；推销

word_family.mean: v. 加强；增进；促进；晋升；提升；提拔；宣传；推销；促使（议会私法议案）通过；使（催化剂）更活泼

sense_info_list.zh: 加强; 促进; 提倡

examination_example.sentence: Tech is designed to really suck you in, and digital products are there to <highlight>promote</highlight> maximal engagement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 技术旨在真正吸引你，而数字产品可促进最大程度的参与。

examination_example.sentence: The parliament also agreed to ban websites that "incite excessive thinness" by <highlight>promoting</highlight> extreme dieting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 议会还同意禁止通过提倡过度节食来“煽动过度瘦弱”的网站。

examination_example.sentence: In South Africa, an HIV-prevention initiative known as LoveLife recruits young people to <highlight>promote</highlight> safe sex among their peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在南非，一个名为“热爱生命”的艾滋病预防项目招募年轻人在同龄人中宣传安全性行为。

sense_info_list.en: advance or raise someone to a higher position or rank

examination_example.sentence: Teachers' unions have fought against getting rid of bad ones and <highlight>promoting</highlight> good ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教师工会一直在反对开除差教师、提拔好教师。

sense_info_list.en: give publicity to a product, organization, or venture so as to increase sales or public awareness

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 促进者；提倡者；助长者；启动子；促进剂；促进子；承办人；出资人；赞助人
n. 促进；增进；发扬；提倡；提拔；晋升；擢升；促销；宣传；推销

word_family.mean: v. 加强；增进；促进；晋升；提升；提拔；宣传；推销；促使（议会私法议案）通过；使（催化剂）更活泼

examination_example.sentence: I'm always baffled when I walk into a pharmacy and see shelves bursting with various vitamins, all promising to accelerate or <highlight>promote</highlight> weight loss.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我走进药店，看到货架上摆满了各种各样的维生素，都承诺加速或促进减肥时，我总是感到困惑。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Promote</highlight> its cultural exchange with other nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 促进与其他国家的文化交流。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Promoting</highlight> discrimination in the name of science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以科学的名义促进歧视。

sense_info_list.en: give publicity to a product, organization, or venture so as to increase sales or public awareness

examination_example.sentence: To motivate visitors to bring in more old shoes, Adidas Brazil <highlight>promotes</highlight> the program in stores by showing videos to educate customers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了鼓励游客带来更多的旧鞋，阿迪达斯巴西店通过播放视频来宣传该计划。

sense_info_list.en: advance or raise someone to a higher position or rank

examination_example.sentence: It's quite possible they're content with how the individuals they <highlight>promoted</highlight> are now performing, merrily ignorant of the damage they're actually causing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很有可能他们满足于他们提拔的人现在的表现，愉快地忽略了他们实际造成的损害。

examination_example.sentence: One reason in particular why these people had been <highlight>promoted</highlight> was that they had been around the longest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些人被提拔的一个特别原因是，他们在公司工作的时间最长。

examination_example.sentence: The fourth cause concerned managers who've been <highlight>promoted</highlight> for reasons other than potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第四个原因是关于那些不是因为潜力而被提升的管理者。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 促进者；提倡者；助长者；启动子；促进剂；促进子；承办人；出资人；赞助人
n. 促进；增进；发扬；提倡；提拔；晋升；擢升；促销；宣传；推销

word_family.mean: v. 加强；增进；促进；晋升；提升；提拔；宣传；推销；促使（议会私法议案）通过；使（催化剂）更活泼

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>promote</highlight> the use of paper bags for shopping.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推广使用纸袋购物。

examination_example.sentence: What motivated the mayor of Paris to <highlight>promote</highlight> the first World Car-Free Day in her city?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么促使巴黎市长在城市推广第一个世界无车日?

examination_example.sentence: Other factors may also significantly influence a project's success, most notably, the size of a scientist's personal and professional networks, and how much a researcher <highlight>promotes</highlight> a project on their own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他因素也可能对一个项目的成功产生重大影响，其中最重要的是，科学家的个人和专业网络的规模，以及一个研究员自己推动一个项目的程度。

sense_info_list.en: give publicity to a product; organization; or venture so as to increase sales or public awareness

examination_example.sentence: The New York Times revealed how Coca-Cola was funding well-known scientists and organizations <highlight>promoting</highlight> a message.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《纽约时报》披露了可口可乐是如何通过资助知名科学家和组织来进行推销的。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>promote</highlight> her own concept of beauty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推销她自己的审美观念。

sense_info_list.en: advance or raise someone to a higher position or rank

examination_example.sentence: According to one recent study, narrow winners of research grants had better chances to be <highlight>promoted</highlight> to professors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据最近的一项研究，少数研究资助的获奖者更有机会晋升为教授。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman say would happen even if she got <highlight>promoted</highlight> in her current company?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果那位女士在现在的公司里升职，她说会发生什么?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 促进；增进；发扬；提倡；提拔；晋升；擢升；促销；宣传；推销

word_family.mean: v. 加强；增进；促进；晋升；提升；提拔；宣传；推销；促使（议会私法议案）通过；使（催化剂）更活泼

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>promotes</highlight> their academic performance and emotional growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它促进了他们的学业表现和情感成长。

examination_example.sentence: The urgency to <highlight>promote</highlight> e-commerce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推动电子商务的紧迫性。

examination_example.sentence: I've started a project to <highlight>promote</highlight> the teaching of the arts in our schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我已经启动了一个项目来促进我们学校的艺术教学。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The Indian cricket team joined around 100 million Indian schoolchildren in washing their hands to <highlight>promote</highlight> (促进) the first ever Global Handwashing Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印度板球队与大约1亿名印度学童一起洗手，以宣传首个全球洗手日。
